    Important books to read for AI

    Jun 9th, 2023
    nlp deep-learning ai machine-learning

    Here is a list of books that I highly recommend to bolster your foundational knowledge in ML and AI:

    Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by Christopher M. Bishop

    Speech and Language Processing, Dan Jurafsky and James H. Martin

    Deep learning, by Ian Goodfellow

    Information Theory,by David Mackay
